Name: Hentai NetWalk
About the game: Hentai NetWalk is a network construction logic game, and what you need to do is to connect all the devices to the network. Gameplay Guide Victory Condition: You need to connect all the devices to the network. How to Play: Left click to rotate clockwise (to the right), and right click to rotate anticlockwise (to the left). Function Keys Keyboard P: One key connection Keyboard S: Emergency avoidance (the background image turns white and you can continue to play) Keyboard N: Next level Game Features Pleasing Pictures Soothing Music (There is a mysterious egg in this game...)
